data.title: Garlic fries
data.text:
Like this McD because they always fully staff the counter so the wait time is short.  

They also have the drink machines in the lobby for consumers to choose whatever they want to drink.  There is no refill limitation for the soft drink.

It's my first time to try the Gilroy Garlic fries here.  It is not as crispy as the original fries and much more oily than the original taste.  This is a new menu item, so I am wondering if it is supposed like what I got.

data.title: Cant you get an order right
data.text: Have been having problems with this McDonalds the last several weeks. We dont ask for much, but no ketchup, or no lettuce. Like a special order is just a little too much for them to handle. Go through the drive thru most of the time and have to continously ask for game pieces as they have apparently decided they would just keep them all themelves. To top it off the last order they decided not to give us the fries we paid for. Contacted them online with a notice but have had no response as of yet. Seems like since they decided to serve breakfast all day they cant get lunch and dinner right. Stop serving breakfast all day and go back to getting it right.
